s.text: From Lorena to Eleanor: "I've been trying today to bring back your face.
From Lorena to Eleanor: "I've been trying today to bring back your face.
Concealing an extramarital affair is easy as long as there are no witnesses.
Gifts, such as dresses and books of poetry (even that of Walt Whitman), represent only circumstantial evidence, and tape recordings of private conversations are problematic in their own right.
